msbt.message: My dear, I LOVE how this room is filled with the essence ofwell YOU, !<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />The in particular—what can I say? Classic " style."
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is your made from mushrooms grown here on this very island? <20_3 arg="3" />It's like something plucked from the pages of a fairy tale! It's positively enchanting, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is simply gorgeous! The way it sparkles in the light you'd think it was made of diamonds rather than ice, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Speaking of ice, one day you really must tell me why it never melts. The mystery is killing me!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, I see. No wonder I felt more at peace the moment I walked in the door. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Decor like this is so calming, don't you think? Whenever I see it, I feel the urge to meditate, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your — are thosebuilding blocks?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Blocks make delightful toys for childrenbut using them to make real furniture? What WILL they come up with next, ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Antiques have such a dignified presence, don't you think? Like your here. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I tell you, the finest things only get better with time. Like yours truly, ! Hahaha!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your it brings back bittersweet memories of my school days. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It may be hard for you to believe, , but I was terribly awkward back then. If only I'd known then that I would blossom into the sophisticated I am today!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! Just look at you with your . It's as if we are at a tropical resort! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I see you're going all in on this whole island life thing. Bravo to that, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This is an interesting choice, . It gives your space that office-y feel.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />, are you working out of your home by any chance?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is your made oflogs? Well, I simply adore that rustic, woodsy look.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And let me say, furniture made from logs is très à propos for island life. You are ON point, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is so cute I can hardly stand it, ! <20_3 arg="3" />If it had cheeks, I would pinch them!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Is your made of fruit picked here on the island? <20_3 arg="3" />Just look at those delicious colors! I could eat them up, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />What a delightfully retro feel your has. It is making me feel terribly nostalgic. <20_3 arg="3" />So many memories are coming back to me. Echoes of the past flashing before my eyes<20_3 arg="6" />Waitwhy are my memories in black and white?! Oh dear! I must be remembering an old movie instead.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your What can I say? It's simply delightful. What a playful streak you have. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />When I was younger, I was obsessed with my toys. I was certain they came to life while I slept. Don't tell anyone I said so, but sometimes I still think they do, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is made entirely out of shells!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Have you tried putting your ear up to it? I bet you could hear the ocean, ! I suppose you can hear the ocean anyway. We are on an island, after all.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This ! If you don't mind my saying, you have excellent taste, . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I didn't realize you enjoyed this kind of sophisticated style. You constantly surprise me, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Why, the egg motif used in your it's so soothingyet also invigorating! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />A dynamic design element like that deserves to be on display, whether it's Bunny Day or not, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If I had to guess, I would say it was handcrafted by someone special to you. You can always tell when something has been crafted with love, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Well, well! I didn't realize you had a passion for space. Well, I suppose I shouldn't be surprised. You are the adventurous sort now aren't you, ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> like this always makes me happy to see, . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I mean, surely it's a sign that good things are afoot in your life, .

<20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />Your Well done. The whole undersea thing is terribly charming. Truly it is.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Why, I can feel myself floating away on a warm ocean current as we speak, .

My stars, ! <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />How I love .<20_2 arg="6" /><20_2 arg="3" />It's as if the stars themselves are twinkling right here in this very room. Oh dear! Perhaps it's time I come back down to earth.

Why, it's like a pirate ship in here!<20_2 arg="10" /> After all, <20_2 arg="9" />I see you have . It sets quite the nautical theme, don't you think?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Aye, aye, Captain ! We shall weigh anchor, hoist the mizzen, anduhshiver the timbers! I must confess, this pirate stuff is quite amusing, !
